dmgAversionToFir.name: Aversion to Fire
dmgAversionToFir.description: If the [[lookup @name]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

dmgBeastWhispere.name: Beast Whisperer
dmgBeastWhispere.description: The [[lookup @name]] can communicate with Beasts as if they shared a common language.

dmgDeathJinx0000.name: Death Jinx
dmgDeathJinx0000.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, one random creature within 10 feet of the dead [[lookup @name]] is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBane000000]{Bane} spell (save DC 13), which lasts for its full duration.

dmgDimensionalDi.name: Dimensional Disruption
dmgDimensionalDi.description: Disruptive energy extends from the [[lookup @name]] in a 30-foot Emanation. Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space in that area. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

dmgDiscipleOfThe.name: Disciple of the Nine Hells
dmgDiscipleOfThe.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body disgorges a Hostile @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgmobImp0000000]{Imp} in the same space.

dmgDisintegratio.name: Disintegration
dmgDisintegratio.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body and nonmagical possessions turn to dust. Any magic items it possessed are left behind in its space.

dmgEmissaryOfJui.name: Emissary of Juiblex
dmgEmissaryOfJui.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body disgorges a Hostile Ochre Jelly in the same space.

dmgFeyAncestry00.name: Fey Ancestry
dmgFeyAncestry00.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the &Reference[charmed] condition, and magic can't put it to sleep.

dmgForbiddance00.name: Forbiddance
dmgForbiddance00.description: The [[lookup @name]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of its occupants.

dmgGloomShroud00.name: Gloom Shroud
dmgGloomShroud00.description: Imperceptible energy channeled from the Shadowfell extends from the [[lookup @name]] in a 20-foot Emanation. Other creatures in that area have Disadvantage on Charisma checks and Charisma saving throws.

dmgLight00000000.name: Light
dmgLight00000000.description: The [[lookup @name]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet. As a Bonus Action, the [[lookup @name]] can suppress this light or cause it to return. The light winks out if the [[lookup @name]] dies.

dmgMimicry000000.name: Mimicry
dmgMimicry000000.description: The [[lookup @name]] can mimic Beast sounds and Humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

dmgPoisonToleran.name: Poison Tolerant
dmgPoisonToleran.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.

dmgResonantConne.name: Resonant Connection
dmgResonantConne.description: The [[lookup @name]] has a supernatural connection to another creature or an object and knows the most direct route to it, provided the two are within 1 mile of each other.

dmgSiegeMonster0.name: Siege Monster
dmgSiegeMonster0.description: The [[lookup @name]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

dmgSlaadHost0000.name: Slaad Host
dmgSlaadHost0000.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, a Hostile Slaad Tadpole bursts from its innards in the same space.

dmgSteadfast0000.name: Steadfast
dmgSteadfast0000.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Immunity to the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition while it can see an ally within 30 feet of itself.

dmgTelepathicBon.name: Telepathic Bond
dmgTelepathicBon.description: The [[lookup @name]] is linked psychically to another creature. While both are on the same plane of existence, they can communicate telepathically with each other.

dmgTelepathicShr.name: Telepathic Shroud
dmgTelepathicShr.description: The [[lookup @name]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to spells from the school of Divination. As a Bonus Action, the [[lookup @name]] can suppress this trait or reactivate it.

dmgVentriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
dmgVentriloquism.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name]] speaks, it can choose a point within 30 feet of itself; its voice emanates from that point.

dmgWarriorsWrath.name: Warrior's Wrath
dmgWarriorsWrath.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on melee attack rolls against any &Reference[Bloodied] creature.

dmgWildTalent000.name: Wild Talent
dmgWildTalent000.description: Choose one cantrip; the [[lookup @name]] can cast that cantrip without spell components, using Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
